titles.title: MP1124 We Fall Down, we lay our crowns

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We Fall Down, we lay our crowns
At the feet of Jesus.
The greatness of mercy and love,
At the feet of Jesus.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And we cry holy, holy, holy.
And we cry holy, holy, holy.
And we cry holy, holy, holy
Is the Lamb.
